{{COI|date=July 2013}} {{Orphan|date=July 2013}} {{Infobox company | name = AbsolutData Research & Analytics | logo = [[File:AbsolutData logo.jpg|thumb|alt= Absolutdata. Logo|Logo]] | type = [[US]] Privately Owned | founder = Anil Kaul, Sudeshna Datta, Suhale Kapoor | foundation = | location = [[San Francisco]],
[[California]], [[United States|U.S.]] | industry = [[Analytics]], [[decision science]]s, [[Big Data]], Predictive Analytics | services = [[Market Research]], CRM Analytics, [[Marketing Mix Modeling]], Consumer Insight Analytics, [[Business Analytics]], Predictive Analytics, [[Marketing Effectiveness]], Conjoint Analytics, Business Intelligence Dashboards, [[Customer Lifecycle Management]], Price Optimization | num_employees = 350 (2013) | homepage = [http://www.absolutdata.com AbsolutData] }} '''AbsolutData Research and Analytics''' is a consulting-oriented Analytics & Research firm based out of [[San Francisco]], [[California]]. The firm provides services in areas of Predictive Analytics, CRM Analytics, Conjoint Analytics, Market Research, Marketing Mix Modeling, Customer Segmentation, Data Visualization and Big Data, to large and mid-size clients, including Fortune 500 companies,http://articles.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/2013-02-13/strategy/37078534_1_market-research-absolutdata-data-analytics in a number of sectors like CPG, retail, financial services, media/entertainment, technology, healthcare, automobiles and consulting. ==Company== Founded in 2001 by Anil Kaul, former consultant for McKinsey, along with Sudeshna Datta, and Suhale Kapoor, AbsolutData is headquartered in the San Francisco Bay Area, California with a delivery dentre in Gurgaon, India and sales offices in New York and Los Angeles. Recently, it has opened up offices in UK and Dubai and a delivery centre in Bangalore.http://www.mrweb.com/drno/news17247.htm AbsolutData Opens in Dubai, Ramps Up in UKhttp://www.deccanherald.com/content/315384/absolutdata-set-up-centre-bangalore.html AbsolutData to set up centre in Bangalore In 2012, Fidelity Growth Partners India committed to a $20 million investment in AbsolutData.http://in.reuters.com/article/2012/08/24/fidelity-investing-absolutdata-idINDEE87N0DW20120824 In 2013, AbsolutData partnered with Alteryx to work together on targeted marketing, predictive analytics and customer insight analytics projects http://www.research-live.com/news/analytics/absolutdata-partners-with-alteryx-and-opens-uk-office/4009131.article ==Awards & Recognition== *AbsolutData was listed as one of the Top 10 Companies in Outsourcing Marketing Services by IAOP (2010) an http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20110506005894/en/AbsolutData-Technologies-Listed-Top-Ten-Companies-%E2%80%9CMarketing AbsolutData Technologies Inc. Listed as One of the Top Ten Companies in “Marketing Services” Outsourcing by the IAOP (2010) *AbsolutData was ranked in Deloitte Technology Fast 50 India 2009 and Fast 500 Asia Pacific, both in 2008 &2009http://www.financialexpress.com/news/absolutdata-features-in-deloitte-rankings-for-2009/580002 AbsolutData features in Deloitte rankings for 2009http://www.witsindia.com/awards_pdf/Tech-Fast-500-Asia-Pacific-2008-Winners-Report.pdf Lighting the way Deloitte Technology Fast 500 Asia Pacific 2008 Ranking and CEO Survey *AbsolutData won the Emerging Company of the Year at Indiatimes BPO Industry Awards 2008http://www.indiamart.com/company/2983742/ ==External links== {{Uncategorized|date=July 2013}}
